item.title: T-Shaped Data Professional or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Specialist
item.description: T-Shaped Data Professional or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Specialist Data Science is a young, growing field. It’s a field where if you’re new, you’re not sure whether to be a specialist or a generalist and if you’re already in the field, new tech comes along so often making it hard to figure out what skills you need to maximize your chances long-term? It’s a field where you can find job descriptions of a dizzying variety, so let’s look at 2 here (pseudo-randomly selected from postings in NYC) to set the scene:
